text: Rachel Michele Nichols (n√©e Alexander, born October 18, 1973) is a sports journalist and television host for ESPN, a sports reporter, and an anchor. She has a NBA talk show called The Jump; weekdays on ESPN, it covers news and stories from around the group and has a group of NBA analysts and players. == Other websites == * Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:Major League Baseball broadcasters Category:National Basketball Association broadcasters Category:Sportspeople from Maryland Category:Writers from Maryland
